label: 不動智神妙録
対訳語: Miraculous records of the immovable spirit
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: ふどうちしんみょうりょく
説明文: [Work by Takuan] in which he declared that the ultimate essence of swordsmanship was the same as the spirit of Zen (p. 414). [沢庵、禅]
